title: Aerospike Debuts High-Performance Distributed ACID Transactions
author: Jelani Harper
description: Latest database upgrades deliver consistency for high-performance OLTP workloads, with strict serializability for multirecord transactions.
cntitle: Aerospike 发布高性能分布式 ACID 事务
cndescription: 最新的数据库升级为高性能OLTP工作负载提供一致性，并为多记录事务提供严格的串行化。
